sentences: Tund aega autosõitu ja olemegi kohal. Mõned ei kannata hästi autosõitu.
Me oleme lõpuks jõudnud kohale ja nüüd olemegi turul.
Kaks tundi sõidame veel ja siis olemegi peresoodas.
context: The word 'olemegi' is a combination of Estonian verb 'olema' (to be) with the suffix '-me' (first person plural - we) and the particle 'gi' which adds emphasis, meaning 'already'. So it literally translates to 'we are already'. It's used when you want to emphasize that something has been accomplished or achieved, especially after some process or journey. The particle 'gi' at the end gives it an emphatic tone, similar to saying 'and now we're here!' or 'finally we've arrived!'
